item.description:
Dear Boston Volunteers,

Do you have a cute dog?

Does your dog has special skills?

Do you have a funny dog costume?

Are you a huge pet lover?

If any of the above question is yes, you and your dog have a good opportunity to be part of our Kick Starter Campaign Ad for the Doggy Fun Run which will happen in June, 2013. All you need is show up with your dog and we will shoot a footage.

Please RSVP if you are OK to use your's and your dog pictures and videos for our future campaign, ads and publishing's.

A highly skilled team from BU will be shooting this footage.

Thank you and see you soon.

AJ & The BU Team, Phani and Josh

The Boston Volunteers
Big Enough to Deliver, Small Enough to Care
Learn more: www.BostonVolunteer.org

group.name: Boston Volunteers. Big enough 2 deliver, small enough 2 care

item.name: Pet Fun Run Video Shoot-Bring your dogs for the campaigning ad
